divs: Sighting DetailsIn July, 1977 I had a close encounter with 3 friends in a corn field on a hill top just outside Christiansburg, VA city limits and now am suffering with my body having been magnetically charged. My health has been severely impaired by this. In addition, using a computer or other electronic device causes severe pain. Please call me to get more details.
Summary: In July 1977, myself and 3 friends saw a UFO that hovered above us before disappearing at a rapid pace.
